description: Main frontend source file for a Flutter implementation of the 2048 game, including app initialization, UI components, dialogs for game outcomes, and restart functionality.

classes.name: _RootScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the main scaffolding, dialogs, and restart logic for the game UI.

classes.name: _RootScaffoldState
classes.description: State class implementing core logic for dialog display, game state handling, and UI layout within _RootScaffold.

classes.name: _ControlBarWithConfirm
classes.description: Stateless widget wrapping the control bar, adding confirmation behavior for restart actions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, initializing and running the main app widget.

methods.name: _maybeShowOutcomeDialog
methods.description: Checks game state to determine if a win or game over dialog should be displayed.

methods.name: _showWinDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog when the player wins the game, offering options to continue or restart.

methods.name: _showGameOverDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog when no moves are left, offering options to close or restart.

methods.name: _confirmAndRestart
methods.description: Asks user for confirmation before resetting the game to start a new session.
